q: `` The Title X Abortion Provider Prohibition Act would deny any family planning funds under title X from going to Planned Parenthood or other organizations that perform abortions,'' said Mike Pence in a speech on the House floor. It would ensure that abortion providers are not subsidized with federal tax dollars. `` Now, let me say,'' Mike Pence continued,`` to be very clear, Mr. Speaker, this legislation does not cut one penny from title X family planning funding. But after American Idol's smash third season, Fuller sued Simon Cowell , alleging that he had ripped off the Idol format by starting the British version of The X Factor. The battle between Fuller and Simon Cowell that played out in the British courts-this was the undercurrent of everything that went on from the beginning of Sitting in his grand but subdued corner-office suite at the headquarters of Sony Music UK, Simon Cowell spoke about the rift that eventually broke up one of the most successful partnerships in entertainment history.`` I didn't steal anything. I just made a new show as he made new shows, Simon Cowell said while sipping ginger tea and dragging on Kool cigarettes.`` At the point when Idol was launched, we both needed each other... Losing this funding would be devastating for many communities across the state. Business can not grow if we do not provide communities in every corner of New York with adequate air service. PROPOSED HIKES Business at Plattsburgh International Airport has boomed since it opened in 2007, as thousands of Canadians have taken advantage of direct flights to Florida, South Carolina and the Caribbean.
